name: Little Game
description:
Description:
  Little game is the little tale of a little one vanishing away from problems: solve puzzles and help little one through his escape from the haunted castle!

Controls:
  Left / Right - Move
  Up / Down - Move the camera
  Z - Jump
  X - Vanish
  R - Restart the current Map
  P - Pause
  Esc - Quit the game

Credits:
  - bubblemad font by Zingot https://zingot.itch.io/ 
  - m5x7 font by Daniel Linssen  https://managore.itch.io/
  - crystal design by Kacper Wozniak https://thkaspar.itch.io/ 

Music, Code, Art by Lirija
